sub_title: Design Lead | Navigating Business Success through Design with a 'Cut the Crap' Approach 🎨
summary:
Hello there! I'm a passionate creative enthusiast and part-time sneaker collector who unashamedly embraces a bad hip-hop fetish. But that's just the tip of the iceberg. When it comes to design and strategy, I take my enthusiasm to a whole new level!

With a keen focus on crafting exceptional experiences that leave a lasting impression, align with business objectives, and truly meet user needs, I'm your go-to person for elevating your brand's creative vision.

Throughout my career, I've been privileged to work with prominent companies like Bol.com, Action, NS, Van Lanschot, Interpolis, Air Miles, KPN, and SuitSupply. Through these experiences, I've had the opportunity to lead creative teams, guide projects, and champion the Design Thinking mindset.

Sharing my passion is what I thrive on. Whether it's collaborating with colleagues, delighting clients, engaging users, or mentoring students, I believe in fostering a culture of creativity and innovation. If you're seeking someone to infuse your projects with boundless creativity and a laser-sharp strategic mindset, let's connect and explore the incredible possibilities we can create together.

Ready to cut the crap and dive into design-driven success? Reach out, and let's make magic happen! 🌟

school.name: De Haagse Hogeschool / The Hague University of Applied Sciences

awards.title: CSS Design Awards - Site of the Day (9 sept 2014)
awards.description:
Ready to fish, launched in Amsterdam in 2006, is the ready to wear women’s line of the Ilja Visser Group. The line was created in order to translate self-expression into versatile and wearable designs.

Source: http://www.cssdesignawards.com/sites/ready-to-fish-by-ilja/25204/

awards.title: Nominee Dutch Interactive Awards (DIA) 2013 (eCommerce)
awards.description: Het redesign suitsupply.com is genomineerd voor een DIA. In dit project heb ik mij ontfermt over de visualisatie van alle producten binnen de webshop zodat deze er altijd op en top uit zien. Daarnaast diende het gehele redesign als basis voor verschillende offline en online uitingen.

projects.title: KPN - MyBee
projects.description:
A browser that kids love and want to use daily. MyBee originally launched back in 2008 as a desktop browser for Windows. With the rise of the tablet KPN decided it was time to relaunch MyBee and take a new shot at being the ‘best and fun browsers for kids’

For more info http://gilamonyet.nl/work/kpn/

contributors.headline: Design Lead | Navigating Business Success through Design with a 'Cut the Crap' Approach 🎨

projects.title: Redesign Air Miles Website
projects.description:
Redesign of Dutch Largest Loyalty Program with the question in mind "How do we make it more personal for them. How wil it stay relevant and most important more enjoyable?"

During this project we have redesigned the total website of Air Miles and created a newer and better mobile app for Android or iOS. For more info read the whole case study at http://gilamonyet.nl/work/airmiles/

contributors.headline: Design Lead | Navigating Business Success through Design with a 'Cut the Crap' Approach 🎨
Executive Creative Director - North Western Europe (NL & UK)

profile_positions.description:
In collaboration with the Head of Design, I contributed to the establishment and composition of the design team. I formulated the design vision and acted as a sparring partner for the Heads of Products across different areas, taking responsibility for design planning during the transition to Product Led work.

One of my key responsibilities is elevating the level of the design team. I organized workshops on design thinking and lean UX, where I trained and guided team members to enhance their skills and knowledge in design methodologies and processes. Through interactive and hands-on sessions, I fostered a culture of continuous growth and development.

Furthermore, as a lead-by-example, I introduced the Job to Be Done approach by guiding a core group during a 6-month pilot phase. This initiative aimed to foster a more user-centric approach and prepare individuals to become ambassadors, ensuring the dissemination of this methodology throughout the organization.
profile_positions.title: Lead Product Designer a.i.

profile_positions.description: Cranking out genius deliverables, Creating enthusiastic vibes, steering on the collaboration between departments to ensure consistent creative results and improved design output. Help customers reach their goals by defining, managing and supporting the creative direction of their projects.
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the implementation of Action's updated visual identity, I held a pivotal role ensuring its successful execution. My primary task was to harmonize the offline and online realms, maintaining consistency in the brand story across both channels. This involved navigating various platforms and media while ensuring the effective and uniform communication of Action's message.

Collaborating closely with both the offline and online teams was essential as it allowed me to leverage the unique attributes of each channel while preserving the core values and visual elements of the updated identity. This required a deep understanding of the brand strategy and target audiences, coupled with meticulous attention to detail.

In addition to upholding brand story consistency, another key responsibility involved supporting the marketing team. To accomplish this, I developed a framework that provided clarity and structure, enabling streamlined messaging and empowering the team with the necessary guidelines and tools to develop and implement effective marketing campaigns.
profile_positions.title: Lead Designer (via NAVARA)

profile_positions.description:
In my role as Creative Director at Xebia, I held the responsibility of defining the creative vision for all Xebia brands, whether it was marketing campaigns, websites, magazines, or events. My objective was to ensure that every aspect of the brand experience was consistent and met the brand's high standards.

To achieve this, I took the initiative to create a new Xebia brand. This involved developing a cohesive look and feel that permeated all brand touchpoints. I collaborated with diverse teams and stakeholders to ensure that all aspects, such as visual identity, graphic design, and tone of voice, seamlessly aligned and projected a powerful brand image.

An integral part of my role was reporting to and providing updates to the board on the progress of each project. This included presenting the various stages of development, discussing any challenges encountered, and offering insight into the strategies and objectives behind each project.
profile_positions.title: Creative Director

profile_positions.description:
Active in the unit called Xebia Studio, specialized in creating meaningful digital products and kickstarting innovation.  
 
I was responsible for setting the design vision for studio, clients and providing guidance and leadership to a team of designers.   Worked for Interpolis, Fontem Ventures, The Dutch Railways and managed a global brand launch with Imperial Tobacco.
profile_positions.title: Lead UX + Visual Designer

profile_positions.description:
Defining and overseeing the implementation of a new setup for our Global Point of Sale (POS) Systems. With the main focus on ensuring that the design of these systems meets the highest standards of functionality, usability, and aesthetic appeal.

Defining the UX strategy, UX architecture, and UX concept for the Global POS Systems for both our employees and customers. By guiding and directing a talented group of designers. Together, we collaborate closely with various stakeholders, such as product managers, developers, and business analysts, to gather requirements and gain a deep understanding of the unique needs of each brand under our company's umbrella.

Employ the principles of Design Thinking to empathize with users, identify their pain points, and develop innovative solutions. By conducting thorough research on industry trends, user behavior, and emerging technologies, I ensured that our design decisions are informed and forward-thinking.
profile_positions.title: Lead UX Designer (via Xebia)

profile_positions.description:
Successfully tackled the challenge of unifying the customer experience across different product teams. By translating the company's rebranding efforts into a digital design vision, I established an overarching creative direction for all digital products. This vision was supported by the development and implementation of design standards and a reusable Design System. The result was an accelerated pace of creation and innovation, leading to a cohesive omnichannel experience across all digital products.

Key Responsibilities:

- Define and manage the creative direction and brand vision for all digital products, ensuring a unified and compelling customer experience.

- Champion design thinking principles and methodologies across the product organization and the company, driving a culture of innovation and user-centered design.

- Facilitate cross-departmental collaboration to enhance design output and achieve seamless integration of design processes within Agile methodologies.

- Establish and maintain design standards and guidelines, leveraging a reusable Design System as an internal library for all product teams.

- Accelerate the creation and innovation process by providing product teams with a comprehensive set of design components and tools.

- Drive the adoption of a cohesive omnichannel experience across all digital products, aligning with company branding and rebranding efforts.
profile_positions.title: Lead Visual Designer (via Xebia)

profile_positions.description: REBBLS is Xebia's Unit for User Experience Design where I was responsible for making Epic User Experiences and Visual Designs. During my time at REBBLS I've worked for companies such as Interpolis, ING and Van Lanschot.
profile_positions.title: Lead Visual Designer

profile_positions.description: Started as 1st Designer and then grown to Senior Designer with responsibility for the User Experience of RAAK. During my time at RAAK I worked for companies such as KPN, AirMiles, ASR & Van Hoeckel.
profile_positions.title: Visual Designer

profile_positions.description: Researched the impact comparison of online video vs text for small businesses in ICT on websites.
profile_positions.title: Internship - Visual Designer
